name: Tavakal – Disk monitoring
author: Tavakal4devs

sections.description:
This is useful when you run your wordpress site on VPS and you don’t want to use any external paid monitoring services

Tavakal – Disk monitoring Features

  • Set emails to receive messages about low space.
  • Set the minimum space before alarming.

Important Notice

This plugin requires cron jobs enabled to work
sections.installation:
Installing the plugin – Simple

  1. In your WordPress admin panel, go to Plugins > New Plugin, search for Tavakal – Disk monitoring and click “Install now“
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Go to General tab under WordPress Settings menu.
  4. Find the “Tavakal – Disk monitoring” option and save the options.

short_description: Free light plugin to monitor the free disk space, and notification system when running out of space.
